paper_abstract: In order to compensate for the current lack of assessing cloud resource allocation and business operation from the economical perspective, this paper introduced the Data Envelopment Analysis (DEA) method which is one of the most famous methods in economics into this field. Based on it, it proposed several new methods to evaluate the efficiency of cloud resource allocation and cloud providers' business operation status through the way of case study.
paper_title: Research on the Efficiency of Cloud Resource Allocation and Operation Based on DEA Method
